title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-1.16 - Responsibility for damage, destruction or theft of automobiles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-1.16 - Responsibility for damage, destruction or theft of automobiles

State Regulations

The State of New York does not insure the safety or
security of vehicles parked in State operated parking areas and disclaims any
responsibility for damage, destruction or theft occasioned by the acts of third
persons. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
296-1.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
